text: @scontorno @lmower3 De Santis was begged to shut Florida down and he said NO. Instead Europeans kept flying in for winter in the sunshine, the cruise ships kept rolling, spring break continued. Florida's citizens are some of the most vulnerable in America and Coronavirus has exploded here.
